passage_text: Marshalls Business Hours. Marshalls is a company specializing in designer brands at half the price of department stores. The company is a part of the TJX Company, parent company of TJ Maxx. In order to lure customers from department stores, Marshalls offers exceptional customer care.

Marshalls Regular Business Hours. 1  Weekdays: You can contact the customer service department 24 hours a day Monday through Friday. 2  Weekends: Customers can contact the customer service department 24 hours a day on Saturday and Sunday.

1 You can also contact the customer service department at the store level. 2  Use the store locator [+] to find your local Marshalls. 3  Weekends: Customers can contact the customer service department 24 hours a day on Saturday and Sunday. 4  In the event a holiday falls on the weekend, the business hours will change.

© 2014 Marshalls | | |. *Valid In-store only. Subject to credit approval. Cannot be combined with any other offer. Excludes gift cards. Discount is only valid when used with your TJX Rewards® Credit Card.

Marshalls Hours of Operation. Marshalls business hours Sunday 11:00 - 8:00 Monday 9:00 - 9:00 Tuesday 9:00 - 9:00 Wednesday 9:00 - 9:00 Thursday 9:00 - 9:00 Friday 9:00 - 9:00 Saturday 9:00 - 9:00 Marshalls Sunday hours are 11 - 8. * Note that Marshalls department store may vary in closing, opening and sunday hours of operation by state and city. The following Marshalls hours are based on the average store hours nationwide and pertain to most stores. **CL= Closed.
